title: Niito-chan to Oniichan
original_name: 新戸ちゃんとお兄ちゃん
sinopse:
Nono is a NEET (acronym of the expression not in employment, education or training (neither work nor study or receive training).) Will suffer with the arrival of his alleged "Onii-chan," Yachiyo, which has a record sister complex.

(Source: Batoto)
